column1: *9 July: News of the oncoming of the enemy reach Pelargir.
* Kings of Gondor Ondoher falls in battle. His sons Artamir and Faramir (son of Ondoher) are also killed.
*13 July: Minohtar is overwhelmed by Wainriders and slain by an arrow.
